name: nako-api
description: - 1x non retarded homosapient - 1x Computer - Python (>=3.6) ## Dependencies - Flask (>=0.1) - Flask-RESTful - Flask_cors - qrcode ### Install ``` $ pip3 install -c requirement.txt # pls see requirement.txt for latest requirement ``` ### or install maunally ``` $ pip3 install flask-restful $ pip3 install flask $ pip3 install flask_cors $ pip3 install qrcode ``` ## How 2 run ``` $ python3 nakoRest.py $ python3 ws.py ``` ## TODO - [x] sqlite query function - [x] logging - [x] keyboard interrupt - [x] hello world get - [x] login post n return - [x] register post n return ## Contributor - YAN
